name: The Wanted Unreality
description:
The wanted unreality is an animated visual novel about a girl who’s in love with her best friend. Because of the fear of saying it out loud she hides all her feelings which result in sadness and numbness.

Attention! This is quite a sad story (with a happy end though)! The beginning can be triggering for people with depression and derealisation.

Playtime: 10-15 min.
